title: Ranked team Looking for a mid lane main gold or high silver Or ADC Main
body: Silver/Gold team looking for a mid and adc main we have people for the roles but they are top jg pref so we need new blood hit me up in game

replies.body: Hi there in an ADC main. IGN: haw piccaboo. Feel free to add me if keen XD
I'll mid - ign Behemoth . I'm playing on acc - 'Orianna mid' atm tho
